com.java.calumjohnston.algorithms

Class LSB

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.java.calumjohnston.algorithms.LSB

  • public class LSB
extends java.lang.Object
    The LSB class performs LSB encoding and decoding on images

    • Method Detail

      • encode

        public java.awt.image.BufferedImage encode(java.awt.image.BufferedImage coverImage,
                                           java.lang.StringBuilder binaryText)
        Performs the LSB encoding algorithm - Detailed in lsb.txt
        Parameters:
        coverImage - Image to be used (acting as the Cover)
        binaryText - Data to be inserted (acting as the Payload)
        Returns:
        Image with data hidden within it (acting as the Stego Image)

      • getPixelData

        public int[] getPixelData(java.awt.image.BufferedImage coverImage,
                          int x,
                          int y)
        Gets pixel data from an image at a specific location
        Parameters:
        coverImage - Image to be used
        x - x coordinate of pixel
        y - y coordinate of pixel
        Returns:
        Tuple of RGB values (representing the pixel)

      • insertData

        public void insertData(int[] pixelData,
                       char data)
        Inserts data into pixel data (by LSB technique)
        Parameters:
        pixelData - Tuple of RGB values
        data - Data to be inserted

      • writePixelData

        public void writePixelData(java.awt.image.BufferedImage coverImage,
                           int[] pixelData,
                           int x,
                           int y)
        Writes pixel data to an image at a specific location
        Parameters:
        coverImage - Image to be used
        pixelData - Typle of RGB values (representing the pixel)
        x - x coordinate of pixel
        y - y coordinate of pixel
